reply.code:
n = int(input())
parents = list(map(int, input().split()))
children = [[] for i in range(n + 1)]
for i in range(2, n + 1):
    parent = parents[i - 2]
    children[parent].append(i)
leaves = []
for i in range(1, n + 1):
    if not children[i]:
        leaves.append(i)
print(*sorted(leaves))
